Production Co: Perfect World Pictures, Universal Pictures, The Kennedy/Marshall Company, Amblin Entertainment, Legendary Entertainment
Synopsis: Three years after the destruction of the Jurassic World theme park, Owen Grady and Claire Dearing return to the island of Isla Nublar to save the remaining dinosaurs from a volcano that's about to erupt. They soon encounter terrifying new breeds of gigantic dinos while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the entire planet.
Title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
